mapper.select: SELECT STORE_NUM as storeNum, STORE_NAME as stroreName, BRANCH_NAME as branchName, MAINCATEGORY_CODE as mainCategoryCode, MIDDLECATEGORY_CODE as middleCategoryCode, SMALLCATEGORY_CODE as smallCategoryCode, DONG_CODE as dongCode, LOT_NUMBER_ADDRESS as lotNumAddress, ROAD_NAME_ADDRESS as roadAddress, LATITUDE as latitude, LONGITUDE as longitude FROM SEOUL WHERE DONG_CODE = #{dongCode}
